title: Which BSNL broadband plan is better, 599 or 675? - Quora

response.answer_text: Plans are different for different states. I'm using Andhra Pradesh as example. 675 plan offers 8Mbps up to some FUP (again FUP is different for different districts eg:100GB), post FUP you will get 2Mbps unlimited internet. 599 plan offers unlimited internet with flat 2Mbps speed without any FUP. 675 plan is better. It offers greater speeds and it also bundles with unlimited calls from your landline 24*7 to any network. ( Not only 675 plan, any plan costs greater than 600 will get unlimited calls to any network 24*7 from their landline - applicable to all states)
BB 675 provides unlimited voice calls alongwith unlimited data usage. While plan 599 doesnt provide unlimited voice calls. If you don’t require unlimited calls 599 plan is better.
